titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to exclude certain payments received under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act from the determination of annual income for purposes of eligibility for veterans pension.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3456-3457)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1626 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 3/22/1994--Introduced. Excludes payments of cash, stock, land, or other interests received from a Native Corporation under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act from annual income for purposes of the determination of eligibility for veterans' pensions.
